text: In this Chinese article, learn how to use 去过 to say that you have been somewhere.伦敦是英国的首都。北京是中国的首都。巴黎是法国的首都。罗马是意大利的首都。我去过伦敦，也去过北京和巴黎。我没有去过罗马。London is the capital of England.Beijing is the capital of China.Paris is the capital of France.Rome is the capital of Italy.I have been to London and have been to Beijing and Paris.I have not been to Rome.1 – 法国的首都是什么？a. 罗马b. 巴黎c. 伦敦d. 北京2 – 我去过北京吗？a. 去过b. 没有去过1. b2. aReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
